message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $1,000,000. It's a fantastic deal for both of us, considering the value it brings to your business. Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping for a price closer to $1,000,000.  Given the significant value this product will bring to your business, I'm willing to come down a little further. How about $975,000? This would still be a great deal for you.

Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $925,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business, and I'm willing to compromise to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
